document_data.name: Carsa
document_data.mainbody: '''Carsa''' was a [[mage]] and [[adventurer]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In the [[1368 DR|Year of the Banner, 1368 DR]], Carsa and her fellow adventurers ventured into the ruins beneath the [[Firewine Bridge]]. Within the dungeon, they discovered a ''[[magic jar]]'' that held the spirit of the [[oni mage]] [[Kahrk]]. Kahrk drove Carsa's companions mad, until they killed each other in a bloody slaughter, leaving her alone with the jar.

She left the ruins with the jar intact, highly traumatized and with a mind that had been greatly fractured by the oni mage's evil influence.
